languages.text: "Я дал{mf||а} внятный ответ на простой вопрос. Полагаю, Эдельтрад, вам оказалось не по силам даже столь малое".

traits.locale_text: "Я дал{mf||а} внятный ответ на простой вопрос. Полагаю, Эдельтрад, вам оказалось не по силам даже столь малое".

languages.text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."
languages.original_text: "Я дал{mf||а} внятный ответ на простой вопрос. Полагаю, Эдельтрад, вам оказалось не по силам даже столь малое".

traits.locale_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."
"I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."
"I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."
"I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."
"I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

languages.text: “这是个简单的问题，而我仅仅是给出了简单的答案。据我所知，就连这种事情你恐怕都做不到，艾德萨德。”
languages.original_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: “这是个简单的问题，而我仅仅是给出了简单的答案。据我所知，就连这种事情你恐怕都做不到，艾德萨德。”

languages.text: «He dado una respuesta directa a una pregunta sencilla. Por lo que tengo entendido, eso está más allá de sus capacidades, Edelthrad».
languages.original_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: «He dado una respuesta directa a una pregunta sencilla. Por lo que tengo entendido, eso está más allá de sus capacidades, Edelthrad».

languages.text: 「私は簡単な質問に率直に回答した。それは、私が知る限り、あなたができたことより以上だね、エデルスラド」
languages.original_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: 「私は簡単な質問に率直に回答しました。それは、私が知る限り、あなたができた以上のことですね、エデルスラド」
「私は簡単な質問に率直に回答した。それは、私が知る限り、あなたができたことより以上だね、エデルスラド」

languages.text: « J'ai donné une réponse directe à une question simple. Ce dont, si j'ai bien compris, vous n'avez pas été capable, Edelthrad. »
languages.original_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai donné une réponse directe à une question simple. Ce dont, si j'ai bien compris, vous n'avez pas été capable, Edelthrad. »

languages.text: "Ich habe eine klare Frage klar beantwortet. Und soweit ich verstanden habe, wart Ihr dazu nicht in der Lage, Edelthrad."
languages.original_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe eine klare Frage klar beantwortet. Und soweit ich verstanden habe, wart Ihr dazu nicht in der Lage, Edelthrad."

languages.text: "Basit bir soruya dosdoğru cevap verdim. Ki anladığım kadarıyla sen bunu dahi beceremiyorsun Edelthrad."
languages.original_text: "I gave a straight answer to a simple question. Which, as I understand, was still more than you could do, Edelthrad."

traits.locale_text: "Basit bir soruya dosdoğru cevap verdim. Ki anladığım kadarıyla sen bunu dahi beceremiyorsun Edelthrad."
